resources.string: What is the emerging disease Corona Covid-19?
It is a disease caused by a new respiratory virus that was first identified in late December 2019
What is the case that is suspected of having Corona?

A suspected case is someone who has symptoms of coronavirus (COVID-19), who has been tested or is about to be tested but has not found out the results of the tests yet. Common symptoms of coronavirus (COVID-19) are fever, chills, cough, sore throat, shortness of breath, runny nose, loss or changes in sense of smell or taste. Anyone who has symptoms, no matter how mild, should get tested and then stay home. Until you find out the results, there is a risk that you may have coronavirus (COVID-19) and could spread the virus to other people. It is very important that you follow the recommendations in this fact sheet.
What happens if my test is positive?
الخط الساخن للاستفسار عن فيروس كورونا
لتلقي دعم لحالات العزل المنزلي ارسل كلمة "عزل" للرقم
خدمة الدعم النفسي من وزارة الصحة
خدمة الرد الآلي عبر واتساب للاستفسارات حول فيروس كورونا

If you tested positive, you must continue to isolate. Both your doctor and a public health officer will contact you to find out more information from you and provide you with further information. After a discussion, a specialist may be involved to further assess your illness. You must remain in your home or accommodation until you are well and an assessment has been made by the Department of Health and Human Services to advise it is safe to return to normal activities.
